DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the study is to evaluate the efficacy of an intensive handwriting treatment in Parkinson's Disease.
DOC.detailed_description: The investigators aimed to understand whether an intensive handwriting treatment with cognitive engagement is more effective than a treatment exploiting only the passive wrist joint mobilization in Parkinson's Disease.
DOC.criteria: Parkinson's Disease patients Mini Mental State Examination (MMSE) score < 24 Left handed subjects Subjects with dyskinesias Subjects with Deep Brain Stimulation
